name: PayAsia
description: In mid-2005, the founders of PayAsia observed the aggressive expansion of Payroll Outsourcing. The emergence of Multi-National Companies into the Asia Pacific region had created a ‘new demand’. There were many local payroll companies, but they were unable to deliver cost effective and high-quality results because of the complex management structure, extensive overheads and Tier-1 software solutions. This is why PayAsia was formed to service the gap in the APAC market, which initially focused on supporting Small and Medium sized enterprises. Today, PayAsia is a leading provider of BPO payroll, payments and HR Solutions across the APAC, Middle East & Africa Regions and has grown to 14 international offices, paying client employees in 80+ countries.

Headline: Payroll, HR Software & Treasury solutions
ShortDescription: PayAsia solves and streamlines our clients’ payroll processes. For over 15 years our team of experts is committed to providing Consistent, Accurate, and Timely processing of your companies payroll and HR transactions.
enhanced_description: PayAsia, established in 2006, is a leading provider of BPO payroll, payments, and comprehensive HR solutions. Initially formed to address the market gap for cost-effective and high-quality services for Small and Medium sized enterprises in the APAC region, it has expanded significantly. Today, PayAsia serves clients across the APAC, Middle East & Africa Regions, operating through 14 international offices and facilitating payroll for client employees in over 80 countries. Their core offerings include payroll, HR software, and treasury solutions, with a strong focus on streamlining payroll processes to ensure consistent, accurate, and timely processing of both payroll and broader HR transactions. PayAsia's services also encompass HRMS/HCM, recruiting, human capital management, onboarding software, and staffing services, all aimed at helping organizations hire top talent faster and more efficiently, boost hiring manager confidence, and reduce talent acquisition costs.
